question: 感慨深い
sourceMnemonic: This is a combination of the words <ja>感慨</ja> meaning "strong feelings" and <ja>深い</ja> meaning "deep." Something that makes you feel strong emotions deep down inside is <vocabulary>deeply moving</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a combination of a jukugo word and an i-adjective. You've learned both of them so just mash them together, with the rendaku making <ja>ふ</ja> to <ja>ぶ</ja>, and you've got the reading down pat!
